text: Augment is the second studio album by American progressive metalcore band Erra. It was released on October 29, 2013 through Tragic Hero Records and was produced by Brian Hood. It is their last album with original vocalist Garrison Lee and guitarist Alan Rigdon, and their first with bassist Sean Price after Adam Hicks' departure. It is also their first album to chart. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== ;Erra * Garrison Lee – unclean vocals * Jesse Cash – guitar, bass,https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdDg5GkpiIs clean vocals * Alan Rigdon – guitar, bass,https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdDg5GkpiIs backing vocals * Alex Ballew – drums ;Additional musicians * Trevor Hinesley – additional vocals * Tyler Riley – additional vocals * Leslie Thompson – additional vocals ;Additional personnel * Brian Hood – production, engineering, mastering, mixing * Aaron Marsh – artwork, design * Luis Lopez Descartes – band photography ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !
